00018 Vector::Vector(QDomNode &vectorNode): left_(-1), leftAttributes_(),
00019 right_(-1), rightAttributes_() {
00020 
00021         // go through all child nodes
00022         for (int i = 0; i < vectorNode.childNodes().count(); ++i) {
00023                 QDomNode tempNode = vectorNode.childNodes().at(i);
00024 
00025                 if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:left")) {
00026 
00027                         left_ = tempNode.childNodes().at(0).nodeValue().toInt();
00028 
00029                         // get the attributes for the left-element
00030                         General::parseAttributes(tempNode, leftAttributes_);
00031                 }
00032 
00033                 else if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:right")) {
00034 
00035                         right_ = tempNode.childNodes().at(0).nodeValue().toInt();
00036 
00037                         // get the attributes for the right-element
00038                         General::parseAttributes(tempNode, rightAttributes_);
00039                 }
00040         }
00041 
00042         // if left bound was not specified
00043         if (left_ < 0) {
00044                 throw Parse_error(QString("Mandatory element spirit:left missing in"
00045                                 " spirit:vector"));
00046         }
00047 
00048         // if right was not specified
00049         if (right_ < 0) {
00050                 throw Parse_error(QString("Mandatory element spirit:right missing"
00051                                 " in spirit:vector"));
00052         }
00053         return;
00054 }

00076 Vector& Vector::operator=( const Vector& other ) {
00077         if (this != &other) {
00078                 left_ = other.left_;
00079                 leftAttributes_ = other.leftAttributes_;
00080                 right_ = other.right_;
00081                 rightAttributes_ = other.rightAttributes_;
00082         }
00083         return *this;
00084 }

00090 void Vector::write(QXmlStreamWriter& writer) {
00091         writer.writeStartElement("spirit:vector");
00092 
00093         // if left bound is invalid
00094         if (left_ < 0) {
00095                 throw Write_error(QObject::tr("Invalid left bound in spirit:vector"));
00096         }
00097         else {
00098                 // start the spirit:left tag
00099                 writer.writeStartElement("spirit:left");
00100 
00101                 // write the attributes for the element
00102                 General::writeAttributes(writer, leftAttributes_);
00103 
00104                 // write the value of the element and close the tag
00105                 writer.writeCharacters(QString::number(left_));
00106                 writer.writeEndElement(); // spirit:left
00107         }
00108 
00109         // if right bound is invalid
00110         if (right_ < 0) {
00111                 throw Write_error(QObject::tr("Invalid right bound in spirit:vector"));
00112         }
00113         else {
00114                 // start the spirit:right tag
00115                 writer.writeStartElement("spirit:right");
00116 
00117                 // write the attributes for the element
00118                 General::writeAttributes(writer, rightAttributes_);
00119 
00120                 // write the value of the element and close the tag
00121                 writer.writeCharacters(QString::number(right_));
00122                 writer.writeEndElement(); // spirit:right
00123         }
00124 
00125         writer.writeEndElement(); // spirit:vector
00126 }

00144 bool Vector::isValid() const {
00145         
00146         if (left_ < 0 || right_ < 0)
00147                 return false;
00148 
00149         return true;
00150 }

00160 QString Vector::toString() const {
00161         if (left_ < 0 && right_ < 0)
00162                 return QString();
00163 
00164         QString str("[");
00165         str += QString::number(left_);
00166         str += "..";
00167         str += QString::number(right_);
00168         str += "]";
00169         return str;
00170 }
00171 
00172 int Vector::getSize() const {
00173         if (left_ < 0 && right_ < 0)
00174                 return 1;
00175 
00176         return left_ - right_ + 1;
00177 }
